whatIsThis.title: What is MatchOps Local?
whatIsThis.description: MatchOps Local replaces your clipboard, stopwatch, and notebook with one app. Plan your lineup and positions before the game. During the match, track substitution intervals, log goals and assists with a tap. Your statistics build automatically—game results, scoring leaders, season trends.
whatIsThis.oneLine: No signup required. Install once and your data stays private on your device. Works anywhere, even without internet.

whoIsThisFor.title: Who Is This For?
whoIsThisFor.description: MatchOps Local is for soccer coaches at any level—from recreational to competitive—who want a simple way to organize games without complex team management software or monthly subscriptions.
whoIsThisFor.item3: Coaches who value privacy and own their data

challenges.title: Common Challenges for Coaches
challenges.challenge1: Juggling multiple tools on game day: clipboard, stopwatch, notebook, lineup sheet
challenges.challenge2: Tracking substitution intervals is tricky—you can't substitute until the game allows it, intervals stretch, and counting in your head takes focus away from what matters
challenges.challenge3: Coach must focus on the game, so most events go undocumented and are soon forgotten
challenges.challenge4: No easy way to track trends, player development, or build statistics across a season
challenges.challenge5: Long-term decisions end up based on memory rather than actual data

technical.title: Technical Details
technical.desc1: MatchOps Local is a Progressive Web App (PWA). This means it installs like a native app but runs in your web browser.
technical.desc2: All data is stored locally on your device using IndexedDB, a browser database. No internet connection is required to use the app.
technical.desc3: Compatible with iOS Safari, Android Chrome, and all major desktop browsers.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: How do I install the app?
faq.a1: Open the app in your browser [Link coming soon]. The app will prompt you to install it - just tap 'Install'.
faq.a2: All data is stored locally on your device in IndexedDB (browser storage). Nothing is sent to external servers.
faq.q3: Can I use it on multiple devices?
faq.a3: Yes, but you'll need to export your data from one device and import it on another. There's no automatic syncing since everything is stored locally.
faq.q4: How do I back up my data?
faq.a4: Open the Settings menu and use the Export function. This creates a JSON file with all your data that you can save and import later.
faq.q5: Can I edit game data after it's recorded?
faq.a5: Yes. You can edit, add, or delete goal events and modify match details. Just open the game from your history and make corrections.
faq.q6: What happens if I lose my phone or it breaks?
faq.a6: If you've made regular exports (backups), you can import your data on a new device. Without backups, data is lost with the device.
faq.a7: Yes. You can create and manage multiple teams (U12, U14, etc.) from the same app and switch between them easily.
faq.q8: How much storage space does the app use?
faq.a8: The app uses your device's free storage space through IndexedDB. Available space depends on your device and can be tens or even hundreds of gigabytes. Typical usage with 100+ games and full statistics is under 50MB.
faq.q9: How do I update the app?
faq.a9: The app updates automatically when you open it and have an internet connection. After an update, the app will notify you of the new version and ask you to reload the page.
faq.q10: Can I share statistics with other coaches?
faq.a10: Yes. You can export statistics in Excel or JSON format and share the files with other coaches via email or messaging apps.
